page.title: 02New Wolvey
page.content: There have been quite a few changes over the years, in particular over the last 10 or 12 years in the{ {POPULATION}of the village.Many new houses have been built in new roads off the south side of Bulkington Road. These new developments have been mainly of detached modern-style family houses. Wolvey was chosen under the Warwickshire Structure Plan as a Key village which should be developed, hence the housing development and the opening of the new school in 1973.During the last 10 years the number of houses has probably doubled. .
